00015 {
00016         collisionWorldTrace = 1,
00017         pickWorldTrace = 2,

00020 
00021 enum collaborativePhysicsType : unsigned
00022 {
00023         No_Physics = 0, // Both are empty (example: statics you can walk through, like tall grass)
00024         Only_Collision = 1, // This object only has collision physics but no pickup physics (example: statics)
00025         Only_Pickup = 2, // This object only has pickup physics but no collision physics (example: items dropped on the ground)
00026         Both_Physics = 3 // This object has both kinds of physics (example: activators)
00027 };
